title: It takes time.
body: This rose takes time to establish. After 3 years, I still don't think it has reached its peak. However, each year it improves, so that is good. Now, the blooms it produces are huge and beautiful. It is a little behind other roses in my garden, but again, it could still be trying to establish itself.
location: Royal Tunbridge Wells, England, United Kingdom

title: Slow but tall
body: Mine is 7 ft tall trained on fence next Woollerton old hall , spirit of freedom has about 3 small blooms , in July , she grows but is shy to flower .
